channel.title: ISRO & Tech News
channel.description: Filtered news feed for ISRO and tech updates

item.title: Intel has limited customer commitments for latest chip manufacturing tech, CFO says
item.description: The volume of processors Intel is set to produce for external customers using its upcoming manufacturing technology is currently "not significant", finance chief David Zinsner said

item.title: Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses launch in India; pre-orders begin at ₹29,900
item.description: The smart glasses combine Ray-Ban’s established frame designs with integrated hardware and Meta’s AI technology

item.title: ISRO to launch earth imaging satellite from Sriharikota on May 18, MPs to witness event
item.description: The EOS-09 satellite, weighing around 1,710 kg, will join India's growing constellation of Earth observation assets, addressing the need for expanded real-time coverage across the country’s vast territory

item.title: U.S. firm Vast keen to use Indian rockets for rides to its planned space station
item.description: Vast CEO Max Hoat discusses potential collaborations with ISRO for launching commercial space station using Indian rockets

item.title: Quiz: Easy like Sunday morning quiz – What has May 11 ever given us?
item.description: What has May 11 ever given us? National Technology Day
